name: Pøls
description:
On the surface level this game is about a dane on a summer night trying to find red danish sausages in the woods and on the beach. But to really grasp this game you have to read between the lines. It's a journey of spiritual growth, philosophize over the now, and how to live it.

We've had some amazing developers working on this amazing game

Karelius S. Knudsen: Project leader, creative designer, environmental artist, level editor, co-QA tester, head of sausages and bride kidnapping expert.

Mathias Hareide: Lead programmer, assistant producer,  co-QA tester, sausage wizard, sausage scientist and party hat master.

Aleksander Pedersen: Co-SFX creator, music man and lead flash drive carrier.

Runa Kleivedalen: Co-SFX creator and music musician.

Special thanks to Salomon "Jezus Shuttlesworth" for the intense voice acting that was "mouth sounds".
